value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Veronica is still in pursuit.
We need to put some distance
between us!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Embla's curse... She's being forced
to turn on us against her will.$k$p$WmMPID_アシュ,ch00_39_Ash_F_Normal,Face|Yes, your assessment is accurate.
Mortals who have inherited Embla's
blood cannot disobey her.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|So even though Princess Veronica
doesn't want to hurt us, she can't
help but fight us?$k$pHow can we ever hope to build
any sort of relationship between
Askr and Embla in that case?!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Urrrgh... Rrraaahhh!$k$p...R-run! Be— Before the voice...$k$p$Fo500,255,0,0,150|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ洗脳,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Enemy,Face|$Fi500|$c255,0,0,255|Kill...$c255,255,255,255|$k$pRun while y— $c255,0,0,255|Kill...Askr!$c255,255,255,255|$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Rrr-raaaghhh!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Let's go—while we can!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but, Princess Veronica...
Should we really just leave
her like this?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...We have to go. We have no
choice. There's nothing else
we can do for her right now.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_06,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ungggh...$k$pMy head...feels like it's splitting
in two.$k$pThis voice...won't stop... Why has
this...just started happening to me?
Why...now?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face|Veronica, there you are. Please,
do not run again.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sissy...$k$pForgive me... I did not mean to.$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That is good... But unfortunately,
Veronica, I have more bad news
to deliver...$k$pIt seems a forbidden tome was stolen
from the imperial vaults.$k$pAll the guards were found dead.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Who would do such a thing?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|According to a soldier who claims
to have survived the attack...$k$pIt was you.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|More lies! It could not have been me!$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Yes, yes. I know that, of course.
My little Veronica could never do
such a thing.$k$pIt seems you've stumbled into a trap.
Someone is framing you.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-who would do something like
that to me?$k$p$Sbs150|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|I would.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...Y-you?!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_11,0|$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Yes. Me. Letizia. Your "Sissy."
I did this to you.$k$pWho else could have won the loyalty
of lords and nobles, leading them to
suspicion, to think you treasonous?$k$pConvincing that "surviving" soldier to
say exactly what I wanted was the
easy part. Simple, but effective.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I don't understand...how could
you do this to—$k$pYou were always so kind to me...
So caring...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course! I have been nothing but
kind to my sweet little Veronica.$k$pIt makes the sting of your undoing
that much sweeter, doesn't it?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Sissy... Why?$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Tell me, Veronica, do you remember
when you told me royal status meant
nothing to you?$k$pI remember as if it were yesterday.
The two of us were sharing some tea
in the garden one bright, sunny day.$k$pYou said that...as long as we were
able to stay close, you didn't care
about titles.$k$pSuch lovely words... Only later that
day did I learn it was the spawn of
a usurper that had spoken them.$k$pAnd after you had already taken
everything from my family—from me.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_レティシア,ch00_41_Letizia_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Now I will extend you the same
courtesy and take everything
from you!$k$pYour role as princess, the faith of
your people... Everything you hold
dear reduced to ash.$k$pThen, when you have lost it all...
then tell me how little your royal
status matters to you.$k$p$Sbs150|
